login.title: Welcome back, Summoner!
login.loginSuccessful: You have been successfully logged in
login.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials
login.LOGIN_INVALID_DATA_DESCRIPTION: Password or username/email is incorrect, or the account is not activated

register.title: Create an account
register.usernameMinLength: The username must be at least 3 characters long
register.usernameMaxLength: The username must be at most 50 characters long
register.usernameRegex: The username must only contain letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens
register.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
register.emailMaxLength: The email address is too long
register.passwordMinLength: The password must be at least 8 characters long
register.passwordUppercase: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter
register.passwordLowercase: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter
register.passwordNumber: The password must contain at least one number
register.passwordSpecial: The password must contain at least one special character
register.REGISTRATION_CONFLICT_DESCRIPTION: The username or email address is already in use
register.REGISTRATION_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: An error occurred. Please try again
register.emailExists: The email address is already in use
register.usernameExists: The username is already in use
register.INVALID_REQUEST_DESCRIPTION: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: No problem â€“ enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.footerText: If you don't receive an email, please check your spam folder. You can request the link again after 60 seconds.
forgotPassword.INVALID_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Please enter a valid email address
forgotPassword.REQUEST_RESET_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: An error occurred. Please try again
forgotPassword.PASSWORD_RESET_SENT_DESCRIPTION: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password. Please check your inbox.
forgotPassword.PASSWORD_RESET_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: An error occurred. Please try again
forgotPassword.REQUEST_RESET_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password. Please check your inbox.

confirmMail.title: Complete Registration
confirmMail.subtitle: Please confirm your email address
confirmMail.description: We have sent a confirmation code to {email}. Please enter the code here to complete your registration.
confirmMail.INVALID_CODE_DESCRIPTION: The code is invalid. Please try again
confirmMail.VERIFICATION_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: An error occurred. Please try again
confirmMail.VERIFICATION_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: Your email address has been successfully confirmed. You can now start directly.
confirmMail.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again
confirmMail.LOGIN_INVALID_DATA_DESCRIPTION: The code is invalid. Please try again
confirmMail.VERIFICATION_CODE_SENT_DESCRIPTION: A new verification code has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.
confirmMail.USER_NOT_FOUND_DESCRIPTION: The user was not found. Please try again.
confirmMail.EMAIL_ALREADY_VERIFIED_DESCRIPTION: Your email address has already been confirmed. You can now start directly.
confirmMail.RESEND_FAILED_DESCRIPTION: An error occurred. Please try again.
confirmMail.RESEND_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: A new verification code has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.

confirmMailSuccess.title: Email successfully confirmed
confirmMailSuccess.subtitle: Welcome to Tournament Fox!
confirmMailSuccess.description: Your email address has been successfully confirmed. You can now start directly.

forgotPasswordMailSend.title: Email for password reset sent
forgotPasswordMailSend.subtitle: Please check your inbox
forgotPasswordMailSend.description: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password. Follow the link to create a new password.

resetPassword.title: Set new password
resetPassword.subtitle: Create a new password for your account.
resetPassword.description: Please make sure to create a secure password that you can easily remember.
resetPassword.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: The password must be at least 8 characters long
resetPassword.INVALID_RESET_TOKEN_DESCRIPTION: The link has expired or is invalid
resetPassword.RESET_PASSWORD_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: An error occurred. Please try again
resetPassword.RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now start directly.
resetPassword.TOKEN_ALREADY_USED_DESCRIPTION: The link has already been used. Please request a new link.
resetPassword.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again

confirmMailState.title: Complete Registration
confirmMailState.subtitle: Please wait a moment
confirmMailState.description: We are verifying your email address. This may take a few seconds.

confirmMailFailure.title: Registration failed
confirmMailFailure.subtitle: Please try again
confirmMailFailure.description: We were unable to verify your email address.
